posts.post_content:
Posted By: Robextend
Hello all,

I just want to say that I have had enormous success on the B/S/T with the progress of my low grade T206 set.  I have gotten about 60 cards and all but 1 have been able to grade out.  I am currently at 12% complete on the SGC registry.  I am once again looking for beaters, willing to pay between $5 and $15 a card depending on the condition.

Thanks again to all that have sold T206 cards to me.

- Rob

Posted By: Matt Aspelund
Yeah, Rob email me if theirs anything u need, Ive got some beaters that i could possibly sell u... email me a list of cards that u need... Matt11867@hotmail.com

Posted By: Rob
Bump - Looking to pay between $10-$15 each for some beater/extremely low-grade T206.
